mapper.select: SELECT B.BILL_CODE AS billCode,B.CUSTOMER_NAME AS customerName,B.BILL_TYPE AS billType,B.TOTAL AS total, B.IS_OPEN AS isOpen,B.BILL_TIME AS billTime,C.TITLE AS title FROM CONTRACT_BILL B LEFT JOIN CONTRACT C ON B.ORG_ID=C.ORG_ID AND B.CONTRACT_ID=C.CONTRACT_ID WHERE B.ORG_ID=#{orgId} ORDER BY B.CREATE_TIME ASC LIMIT 0,10

SELECT C.TITLE AS title,B.BILL_CODE AS billCode,B.CUSTOMER_NAME AS customerName,B.TOTAL AS total,B.BILL_TYPE AS billType,B.IS_OPEN AS isOpen,B.BILL_TIME AS billTime FROM CONTRACT_BILL B LEFT JOIN CONTRACT C ON B.ORG_ID=C.ORG_ID AND B.CONTRACT_ID=C.CONTRACT_ID WHERE B.ORG_ID=#{orgId} ORDER BY B.BILL_TIME DESC LIMIT 0,10
